vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Πόρκιος, -ου, ὁ
Porcius, prænomen of Porcius Festus (see: Φῆστος): Act.24:27.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.24.27; also called Porcius at Act.24.27;
§ Porcius, "[tribal name]"
Porcius, (Proper name), Acts 24:27*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
波求[非斯都]
1)腓力斯的繼承者，為猶大的巡撫 (徒 24:27)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
波求[非斯都]
1)腓力斯的继承者，为犹大的巡抚 (徒 24:27)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Bốt-tiu; Pọt-xi-u (Phê-tu). nguồn gốc: tiếng La-tinh
